products.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Rimini, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

products.title: Rimini, Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

products.title: Rimini, Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.description: Stirlooyster cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. products.title: Burst Campfire Smoke Roller Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the burst campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Burst Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: Warm and creamy, the burst pearl is the perfect blind if you are needing a lightly coloured blind but white is too sharp for your tastes. Working well with earthier natural colours like browns and greens for a warm ambience or blues, whites and random netting on the wall for a nautical theme. An absolute classic, the pearl will always be the best of beige. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Linen Roller Blind
products.description: Stylish & contemporay blackout linen is the dream nuetral for your home or office. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
